name: Maudit
description:
The prototype has some of the initial combat mechanics you would face whilst in search of how to break the curse.

You play as Pier Delmort, a french sailor who has just purchased a ship, It was cheap for a reason... rumors are there has been a curse on the ship for hundreds of years.
Any man to captain her, falls victim to the calling curse, The ship can't be at sea for more than few days before the call of the deep claims her, as for the Captain, all creatures dead or alive upon land and sea will hunt his every move!
The instructions on how to break the curse is kept on one of the islands in the northern waters.
